summary: All this does is add silent voice files for Mirmulnir, normally you won\'t need these, see the full description on the mods page or the ReadMe for details.
descriptionHtml:
All this does is add silent voice files for Mirmulnir, normally you wouldn\'t need these but the unofficial patch added a new voice actor for these unused lines, some don\'t like the change so this lets them bypass it as these loose files take precedence over the USKP\'s BSA file.

Credits:  I\'ve reused a silent audio file with authorisation from the mod \'SILENT Level Up Noise\' by AlturDrake located here (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26049), I could have made a new silent file just for this but I find re-inventing the wheel when one is already available to use and with authorisation gained a silly waste of time so my thanks to AlturDrake for the permission to re-use his audio asset.
author: Badmagic
